docs.text: i know it already opened in december , but i finally got around to seeing rushmore last weekend , and it was one of those rare oppritunites that i got to leave the theatre feeling proud about paying the expensive ticket price .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as the final scene closed out in happy slow-mo fashion , i felt happy to have been priveleged enough to watch such a good display of filmmaking .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: jason schwartzman , his face oddly intriguing behind those large braces and glasses , steals the show as max fischer , the most well known rushmore academy student who gets terrible grades , but compensates for it by organizing most of the school's clubs and organizations ( i . e .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the fencing team and writing and producing school plays ) and often pulling outrageous stunts , one that eventually earns him an expulsion .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this stunt , building an aquarium on the school's baseball diamond , is a plot to steal the heart of widowed elementary teacher rosemary cross ( olivia williams ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he funds this aquarium with the help of millionare herman blume ( a very oscarworthy bill murray ) , who eventually finds himself falling in love with miss cross .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: rosemary and herman begin dating-and the fun begins ; herman and max go at it head to head in a battle for miss cross .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: herman manages to destroy max's bike , while max cuts herman's brakes , and it goes on like this .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but eventually max realizes he is too young for miss cross , and he can't stand in the way of two people in love .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the academy of arts & sciences really messed up this year ; they completely overlooked rushmore ( and , if you ask me , it wasn't an accident ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it maybe wasn't best picture material , but it certainly deserved a screenplay nod ( instead of elizabeth ) , and bill murray's absense from the ballot is a complete snub .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the entire mood of the film is one reason it is so good ; at one point it's fun , and the next scene can turn serious and dramatic .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the cinematography gives the movie an important feeling , as well .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i hope rushmore can overcome its' oscar snubs , and be enjoyed by intelligent film goers .
docs.label: positive
